maqras.text: ware no chobatsu wa, hontoni tsukuna chobatsudearu.' To tsuge shirase nasai
Sore kara, iburahimu no hinkyaku no koto ni tsuite kare-ra ni katare
Kare-ra (hinkyaku no 2 tenshi) ga, kare no tokoro ni haitte kite,`heian'are.' To aisatsu shita toki,`watashi-tachi wa, anata gataga, kowaidesu.' To itta
Kare-ra wa itta. `Osoreru koto wanai. Watashi-tachi wa rikona 1-ri no musuko ga 授Ru kippo o, anata ni motarashita noda
Kare wa itta. `Watashi wa sudeni rorei ni tasshite iru no ni, anata gata wa watashi ni kippo o kudasaru no ka. Ittai anata gata ni nani no kippo ga arou ka
Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, shinri ni yotte kippo o anata ni tsutaeru. Dakara shitsubo shite wa naranai
Kare wa (kotaete) itta. `Mayotta-sha no soto wa, dare ga omo no o jihi ni zetsubo shimashou ka
Kare wa (mata) itta. ` (Omo no) shito no kata gata yo, anata gata (ga ko rareta tokoro) no yoken wa, nanideshou ka
Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa tsumibukai min ni noko wa sa reta
(Daga) ruto no ichizoku wa betsudearu. Watashi-tachi wa, kare-ra no zen'in o kanarazu sukuudearou
Daga watashi-tachi no kakunin shite iru kare (ruto) no tsuma wa betsu de, ka no on'na wa haigo ni nokoru hitobito no hitoridearu
Sorekara shito-tachi ga ruto no ichizoku no moto ni kita toki
kare wa itta. `Anata gata wa, minarenai kata gatadesu
Kare-ra wa itta. `Iya, watashi-tachi wa kare-ra no utagai o daite iru koto ni kanshite, anata no tokoro ni kita nodearu
Watashi-tachi wa shinri o motarashita. Hontoni watashi-tachi wa, shinjitsu o tsugeru

Sorede yoru no akenai ma ni, anata no kazoku to issho ni tabidachi nasai. Soshite anata wa mina no ichiban-go kara tsuite iki, anata gata no dare mo ushiro o furimuka sete wa naranai. Tada, meiji rareta tori ni jikko shi nasai
Ware ga kono kettei o kare ni shiraseta no wa, nokotta korera no (tsumibukai)-sha-tachi o (yoku) asa horobosu tamedearu
Machi no jumin-tachi wa,(wakamono no nyusu o kii te) yorokobi ni karitate rarete yattekita
Kare (ruto) wa itta. `Kono ho gata wa, watashi no hinkyakudesu. Watashi o hajisarashi ni shinaide kudasai
Arra o osore, watashi ni haji o kaka senaide kudasai
Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, gaikoku no mono (o tomeru koto) o, anata ni kinjinakatta ka
Kare wa itta. `Moshi anata gata ga okonaou to surunara, koko ni watashi no musume-tachi ga imasu
(Yogen-sha yo) anata no seimei ni kakete (chikau). Hontoni kare-ra wa kokoro o ran shite, ate mo naku samayou monodearu
Sore de hitokoe (chobatsu) ga, hinode ni kare-ra o osotta
Ware wa sono (machi o)-jo o shita ni shite tenpuku shi, yaita doro no ishi o kare-ra no ue ni fura seta
Hontoni kono nakaniha chisei aru mono e no, shuju no shirushi ga aru
Sono (machi no ato) wa, daido ni sotte nao sonzai suru
Hontoni kono nakaniha shinko suru mono e no hitotsu no shirushi ga aru
Mata mori no nakama mo fugi o okonau monodeatta
Sokode ware wa sore ni hofuku shita. Hontoni kono 2tsu (no ato) wa daido ni sotte,(ima) akiraka (ni mi rareru no)dearu
Hijuru no nakama mo shito-tachi o usotsuki to shite kyohi shita
Ware wa kare-ra ni waga shuju no shirushi o kudashitaga, kare-ra wa sorera o sake (te mushi shi)ta
Kare-ra wa (iwa) yama ni ie o horikomi, anzendearu to kangaete ita
Soredearu Cho, hitokoe (chobatsu) ga, kare-ra o osotte
kare-ra ga (tokubetsu no chishiki to gijutsu de) kizuki itonande ita koto wa, kare-ra ni totte nani mo yakudatanakatta

Ware wa ten to ji, soshite sonoaida ni aru subete no mono o, tada shinri ni motodzuite sozo shita. (Shinpan no)-ji wa hontoni kite iru noda. Dakara anata wa nasakebukaku kan'yo ni (hitobito no kashitsu ya ketten o) yurushite yaru ga i
Hontoni anata no omo wa, ban'yu o sozo shita zenchi no okata de ara reru
Ware wa taezu kurikaesa rerubeki 7tsu (no setsu) to, idaina kuruan o anata ni sazuketa

Ano mono-tachi no nan'ninka ni ware ga sazuketa tanoshimi ni taishite urayamashi-so ni shite wa naranai. Soshite sore ni kokoro o itamete wa naranai. Sore yori anata no tsubasa o hikuku (shite yasashiku) shi nasai
Soshite itte yaru ga i. `Hontoni watashi wa komeina keikoku-shadearu
(Keiji o katte ni) bunkatsu shita mono ni taishite mo, ware wa keiji shite oita
Sunawachi kuruan o (kare-ra no tsugo no yoi yo ni) danpen ni shita-sha-tachi ni mo
Sore de, anata no omo ni chikaite, ware wa kanarazu kare-ra subete o jinmon surudearou
Kare-ra ga okonatta subete no koto ni tsui te
Dakara anata ga meiji rareta koto o sen'yo shi nasai. Soshite tashinkyo to kara tozakare
Hontoni ware wa, chosho suru mono ni taishi, anata o jubun ni mamotte yaru
Kare-ra wa, arra ni soto no kami o haisuruga, mamonaku shirudearou
Ware wa kare-ra no kuchi ni suru koto de, anata no mune ga shimetsuke rareru no o shitte iru
Dakara, anata no omo o tataete 唱念 Shi, sajida shite
sadame no toki ga otozureru made, anata no omo ni tsukae nasai
